analyzed: rdo rje zhes gsungs so/_/byang rgyud dpal po zhes bya ba'i spyan 'grel pa'o//

translated: accumulation, junction, and seeing, and the path of meditation🔽and the path of perfection.🔽This is the path of the Mahayana, and it is🔽appropriate to understand and become familiar with the relative🔽and the ultimate.

analyzed: la/_phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma dmig g.yor tshhul shes pa/_/dngos po thogs

original: med gzugs la rab tu 'jug_/dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs/_/
analyzed: med gzugs la rab tu 'jug_/dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs/_/
translated: The friend of virtue is realized through one’s vidya.🔽One goes to the stage of pratyekabuddhahood, the supreme bliss of

original: rang byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog_/zhes pa/_phyi nang gi rten
analyzed: rang byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog_/zhes pa/_phyi nang gi rten
translated: the wish-fulfilling gem.🔽The outer and inner dependent originations are understood to be🔽like illusions and mirages.

original: 'brel gnyis ni yul mi 'grub rang rgyal byang sems 'dod pa'i 'jug sgo'i tshhul ni thog
analyzed: 'brel gnyis ni yul mi 'grub rang rgyal byang sems 'dod pa'i 'jug sgo'i tshhul ni thog
translated: The door of entry for the Svatantrikas and Bodhisattvas is the fivefold analysis.

original: mar phung po lnga'i 'ang gzugs kyi phung po la de'i rten 'brel sgo nas dpyod par byed
analyzed: mar phung po lnga'i 'ang gzugs kyi phung po la de'i rten 'brel sgo nas dpyod par byed
translated: The first of these is the analysis of the form aggregate, which is the basis of the five aggregates, from the point of view of its dependent origination.

original: pa'ang lnga par nyan thos kyi tshhe goms pas slob dpon la mi rten par tshhul khrims brgyad do
analyzed: pa'ang lnga par nyan thos kyi tshhe goms pas slob dpon la mi rten par tshhul khrims brgyad do
translated: The fifth is the eight precepts, which are not dependent on a master because of being accustomed to the Shravaka vehicle.

original: rjes thob kyi shes pas mngon du byas pas/_gnas skabs kyi yid bzhin bde ba
analyzed: rjes thob kyi shes pas mngon du byas pas/_gnas skabs kyi yid bzhin bde ba
translated: Since it is actualized by the consciousness of postmeditation, one obtains the temporary bliss of the wish-fulfilling gem.

original: mchog gis thob ste rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i rigs so/_/de dang de ni dmigs pa
analyzed: mchog gis thob ste rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i rigs so/_/de dang de ni dmigs pa
translated: This is the family endowed with miraculous powers.

original: chen po 'dod khong khro nga rgyal ma rig pa the tshhom lta ba 'jig phrag gnyis mthar log lta lam bsten pa gnyis so
analyzed: chen po 'dod khong khro nga rgyal ma rig pa the tshhom lta ba 'jig phrag gnyis mthar log lta lam bsten pa gnyis so
translated: The great objects of observation are the two of desire, anger, pride, ignorance, doubt, view, and the two of adherence and wrong view.

original: mchog du chu rdul 'dod lnga dang me gnyi ga log lta mchog bdun tshhul khrims la brgyad do/_/gzugs khams nyi shu rtsha
analyzed: mchog du chu rdul 'dod lnga dang me gnyi ga log lta mchog bdun tshhul khrims la brgyad do/_/gzugs khams nyi shu rtsha
translated: The supreme objects of observation are the seven of desire, anger, pride, ignorance, the five desires, and the two of wrong view and adherence to rules and ritual.🔽The twenty of the form realm are the four of the first absorption, the three of the second, the three of the third, and the ten of the fourth.

original: brgyad de khong khro bzhi bzhi por ro/_/la sogs pa dmigs pa bsgrub pa ye shes brtshon 'grus thabs yang dag pa'i grub
analyzed: brgyad de khong khro bzhi bzhi por ro/_/la sogs pa dmigs pa bsgrub pa ye shes brtshon 'grus thabs yang dag pa'i grub
translated: The four of anger and so forth are the four of anger, pride, ignorance, and doubt.

original: pa 'phrin las chen po'o/_/bdun gyis 'phags la/_theg pa chung ngu gnyis sdug bden kyang lta🔽spyod 'bras bu 'dod khong khro nga rgyal ma rig pa the tshhom lta ba 'jig mthar log lta ba mchog du chu rdul phyag gnyis gang
analyzed: pa 'phrin las chen po'o/_/bdun gyis 'phags la/_theg pa chung ngu gnyis sdug bden kyang lta spyod 'bras bu 'dod khong khro nga rgyal ma rig pa the tshhom lta ba 'jig mthar log lta ba mchog du chu rdul phyag gnyis gang
translated: The seven that are superior are the two of the lesser vehicle, the two of the greater vehicle, and the three of the secret mantra.

original: po gnyis spyod tshhul gyis 'phags pa'o/_/lnga pa bstan nyan thos kyi rigs 'dod lnga log lta ba
analyzed: po gnyis spyod tshhul gyis 'phags pa'o/_/lnga pa bstan nyan thos kyi rigs 'dod lnga log lta ba
translated: The five that are superior are the five of the desire realm, the five of the form realm, and the five of the formless realm.

original: mchog bdun no gang snyam pa la/khams dang gzugs khams nyi shu rtsha brgyad khong khro med pa nyid bzhi bzhi bor
analyzed: mchog bdun no gang snyam pa la/khams dang gzugs khams nyi shu rtsha brgyad khong khro med pa nyid bzhi bzhi bor
translated: The seven that are the most superior are the four of the desire realm, the four of the form realm, and the three of the formless realm.🔽The four of the desire realm are the four of anger, pride, ignorance, and doubt.

original: ro/_/_rabaden bzhi bden pa bzhi ni snga ma bden pa ni 'khor ba'i bu ra'o nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o rgyun mi
analyzed: ro/_/_rabaden bzhi bden pa bzhi ni snga ma bden pa ni 'khor ba'i bu ra'o nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o rgyun mi
translated: The four of the form realm are the four of pride, ignorance, doubt, and view.🔽The three of the formless realm are the three of view, pride, and ignorance.

original: rtag pa dang sa sdug bsngal su stong pa bdag med pa'o kun 'byung ba'i rgyu stema rig rgyu dang kun 'byung ba🔽cha ba dang rab tu ye che skyed pa dang rkyen gyi rnam pa'o 'gog pa'i bden pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'byung ba'o so sor
analyzed: rtag pa dang sa sdug bsngal su stong pa bdag med pa'o kun 'byung ba'i rgyu stema rig rgyu dang kun 'byung ba cha ba dang rab tu ye che skyed pa dang rkyen gyi rnam pa'o 'gog pa'i bden pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'byung ba'o so sor
translated: The truth of suffering is impermanent, painful, empty, and without self. The truth of the origin is the cause, the source, the origin, and the condition.

original: brtag pa'i 'gog pa'o/_/sdug 'gog pa dang sdug zhi ba dang gong na gya nom pa dang nges par su 'byung ba'o🔽lam bzhi ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu'o/_/'phags brgyad la bya'o lam dang nges pa can ma rigs pa sel basrigs pa
analyzed: brtag pa'i 'gog pa'o/_/sdug 'gog pa dang sdug zhi ba dang gong na gya nom pa dang nges par su 'byung ba'o lam bzhi ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu'o/_/'phags brgyad la bya'o lam dang nges pa can ma rigs pa sel basrigs pa
translated: The truth of cessation is nirvana, the individual investigation of cessation, the cessation of suffering, the pacification of suffering, the supreme state, and the definite emergence.🔽The truth of the path is the cause of nirvana, the path, the correct method, the achievement of the goal, the application, and the definite emergence.

original: dang sgrub pa dang nges par 'byin pa'o_don rtogs rab tu spong ba 'is/_/ye shes bcu drug cha
analyzed: dang sgrub pa dang nges par 'byin pa'o_don rtogs rab tu spong ba 'is/_/ye shes bcu drug cha
translated: The wisdom of the four truths is the realization of the meaning, the complete abandonment, the purification, the complete pacification, and the definite emergence.

original: sbyangs rab zhi ba/_/rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni/_/nyon
analyzed: sbyangs rab zhi ba/_/rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni/_/nyon
translated: Having gradually purified the stream-enterers and so on,

original: mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sar du 'gro/_/zhes pa/_sdug bsngal 'dod khong
analyzed: mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sar du 'gro/_/zhes pa/_sdug bsngal 'dod khong
translated: one will go to the stage of completely pacifying the afflictive enemies.

original: khro nga rgyal ma rig pas the tshhom lta ba kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi sgo nas chos bcu
analyzed: khro nga rgyal ma rig pas the tshhom lta ba kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi sgo nas chos bcu
translated: The sixteen aspects of the four noble truths are the entrance to the path.🔽The sixteen aspects of the four noble truths are the entrance to the path.🔽The sixteen aspects of the four noble truths are the entrance to the path.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dpal gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i spyan 'grel pa'o//
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dpal gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i spyan 'grel pa'o//
translated: The commentary on the eye of the glorious Guhyagarbha Tantra, the Net of Illusion of Vajrasattva.

original: rags pa phra ba gnyis kyis 'dod khams kyi 'phra ba spong la/_dgra bcom pas gcig gis
analyzed: rags pa phra ba gnyis kyis 'dod khams kyi 'phra ba spong la/_dgra bcom pas gcig gis
translated: The coarse and subtle are the two that abandon the subtle of the desire realm, and the arhat abandons one.

original: phra rags gnyis su phye ba spang ngo gong ma gnyis kyi spong bar 'chad de/_yongs su bsdoms pa'i dar
analyzed: phra rags gnyis su phye ba spang ngo gong ma gnyis kyi spong bar 'chad de/_yongs su bsdoms pa'i dar
translated: The division into coarse and subtle is explained as the abandonment of the two higher realms,🔽the one with the complete set of afflictions, and the one with the fetters.

original: can dang 'ching bar ces pa'i rjes su bsrung ba'i gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang rtags pa'i skal ba can dang mi g.yo ba'i
analyzed: can dang 'ching bar ces pa'i rjes su bsrung ba'i gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang rtags pa'i skal ba can dang mi g.yo ba'i
translated: After the one with the fetters, there is the one who abides in the state of protection, the one who is unshakable, the one who is of the class of those who are certain, and the one who is immovable.

original: rang can no/_/des mthar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa drug gi 'ang mchog mngon du
analyzed: rang can no/_/des mthar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa drug gi 'ang mchog mngon du
translated: By that, the supreme of the six nirvanas of peace is actualized.🔽Those are the childish understandings.

original: byed pa dag ni byis pa'i shes pa dag go/_/drug pa rigs ma nges pa gang snyam pa la/🔽theg pa gang du bstan pa'i cha nges pa'i/_/yang na kun la mthun par 'byam
analyzed: byed pa dag ni byis pa'i shes pa dag go/_/drug pa rigs ma nges pa gang snyam pa la/🔽theg pa gang du bstan pa'i cha nges pa'i/_/yang na kun la mthun par 'byam
translated: The sixth is the undetermined type.

original: par 'jug_/zhes pa/_skye bo'i sa pa phyogs la sbyangs pa'i nges pa can ma yin
analyzed: par 'jug_/zhes pa/_skye bo'i sa pa phyogs la sbyangs pa'i nges pa can ma yin
translated: The level of beings is not definite in terms of training.🔽The second line says:

original: pa nyid yin pa dang /_yang mi mthun pa ni skye'o sbyangs pa phyogs med pa'i skal ba
analyzed: pa nyid yin pa dang /_yang mi mthun pa ni skye'o sbyangs pa phyogs med pa'i skal ba
translated: The level of those who are not in accord is definite in terms of training.🔽The third line says:🔽The level of those who are trained is not definite in any way.🔽The fourth line says:

original: sgo kun nas bsdur bar slob pa'i skal ba can nyid yin pa dang /_yang na nges
analyzed: sgo kun nas bsdur bar slob pa'i skal ba can nyid yin pa dang /_yang na nges
translated: The level of those who are trained in all ways is definite.🔽The fifth line says:🔽The level of those who are not definite is not taught as being this or that.🔽The sixth line says:

original: med 'di zhes bstan pa med/_'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs zhes pa/
analyzed: med 'di zhes bstan pa med/_'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs zhes pa/
translated: This is not definite. Vajradhara taught this.🔽The seventh line says:🔽The level of those who are not in accord is the mundane.🔽The eighth line says:

original: mi mthun pa ni 'jig rten phyal pa'o/_/kun gyi skal ba'i 'phro can rkyen la rag
analyzed: mi mthun pa ni 'jig rten phyal pa'o/_/kun gyi skal ba'i 'phro can rkyen la rag
translated: The level of those who are in accord with all is dependent on conditions.🔽The ninth line says:🔽The level of those who are definite is not ascertained in general.🔽The tenth line says:🔽The level of those who are not definite is taught as being three.

original: las pa'i phyir/_sems skye spyi'is ste rigs nges pa can du mi zin de rgyu can dang / phul pa dang gcig tu ma chad kun la 'jug pas rigs ma nges pa ni gsum yin par ston pa
analyzed: las pa'i phyir/_sems skye spyi'is ste rigs nges pa can du mi zin de rgyu can dang / phul pa dang gcig tu ma chad kun la 'jug pas rigs ma nges pa ni gsum yin par ston pa
translated: The eleventh line says:🔽The two tantras of the self-originated truth and the king are the elucidations of the words.🔽The twelfth line says:

original: bden pa rang 'byung rgyal tshhab rgyud gnyis kyis bka' gsal ba'i/_bdun pa bstan lha dang mi'i
analyzed: bden pa rang 'byung rgyal tshhab rgyud gnyis kyis bka' gsal ba'i/_bdun pa bstan lha dang mi'i
translated: The teaching is for gods and humans.

original: rigs gang snyam pa la/_/dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa/_/'dod
analyzed: rigs gang snyam pa la/_/dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa/_/'dod
translated: What kind of family?

original: khams lha dang mir ni skye ba'i rgyu zhes pa/_rnam par dkar gnag las legs
analyzed: khams lha dang mir ni skye ba'i rgyu zhes pa/_rnam par dkar gnag las legs
translated: The cause for being born as a god or human of the desire realm is🔽to practice the ten virtues and to avoid the ten nonvirtues.🔽Virtue and nonvirtue are so called because of the meaning of “good” and🔽“bad” karma, respectively, and because of the meaning of “to connect.”

original: nyes dang sbyor ba'i don gyis dge sdig ste/_dge ba bcu sdig pa bcu'i sa spangs pa
analyzed: nyes dang sbyor ba'i don gyis dge sdig ste/_dge ba bcu sdig pa bcu'i sa spangs pa
translated: The ten virtues are to avoid the ten nonvirtues.🔽By the power of the degree of purity or impurity, one is born as a human

original: tshhabs che chung dang dag ma dag gis/_gling bzhi dang gling phran brgyad bcu gnyis kyi mi
analyzed: tshhabs che chung dang dag ma dag gis/_gling bzhi dang gling phran brgyad bcu gnyis kyi mi
translated: of the four continents or the eighty minor continents, or as a god of the🔽six desire realms. This is the cooperating cause, which is shared with the

original: dang 'dod khams drug gi lhar skye ba ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ste rkyen dang thun mong pa'o/
analyzed: dang 'dod khams drug gi lhar skye ba ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ste rkyen dang thun mong pa'o/
translated: conditions.

original: zla zlog nas dge ba las log ste mi dge ba bcus 'di rnams su gnas tha ma byol song mun pa pa dang /
analyzed: zla zlog nas dge ba las log ste mi dge ba bcus 'di rnams su gnas tha ma byol song mun pa pa dang /
translated: The opposite of virtue is the ten nonvirtues. By these, one is born in the🔽lowest realms: the animal realm, the realm of the hungry ghosts, and the

original: yi dwags kun gdung ba dang /_yang ba'i dmyal ba yi dwags rgyu rkyen du gyur pa ste/_de
analyzed: yi dwags kun gdung ba dang /_yang ba'i dmyal ba yi dwags rgyu rkyen du gyur pa ste/_de
translated: hells.

original: spangs pas thob pa'i sa ni lam stegs so/_/tshhad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo bsgom
analyzed: spangs pas thob pa'i sa ni lam stegs so/_/tshhad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo bsgom
translated: The level of attainment by avoiding these is the approach.

original: byed pa/_/tshhangs gnas las sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no/_/zhes pa/_byams pa
analyzed: byed pa/_/tshhangs gnas las sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no/_/zhes pa/_byams pa
translated: The cause of birth in the Brahma realm and so forth is the four immeasurables.🔽The four immeasurables are love, compassion, joy, and equanimity.🔽Each of these is fourfold.

original: dang snying rje dga' ba dang /_thun mong min pa 'dod pa med pa sems can la dmigs pa gtod pa can
analyzed: dang snying rje dga' ba dang /_thun mong min pa 'dod pa med pa sems can la dmigs pa gtod pa can
